snippet.title: Fortnite Festival - Battle Stage Trailer (feat. Metallica)
snippet.description:
🌒Exit light, enter the Battle Stage🌒 fn.gg/FestivalS4 

There’s a storm raging over Fortnite Festival! James Hetfield, Lars Ulrich, Kirk Hammett, and Robert Trujillo from Metallica are the Icons of Fortnite Festival Season 4 — and they’re not just here to perform, they’re here to battle. Season 4 will introduce the Battle Stage, a brand-new, musical PVP experience in Fortnite where 16 players will enter, but only one can emerge victorious. Compete against your opponents across a four-song setlist to be the last one standing when the curtain comes down and it all fades to black. The battle begins tomorrow with the launch of Fortnite Festival Season 4!

Follow Fortnite Festival on social media:
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/fnfestival
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@fnfestival
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fnfestival
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fnfestival
